CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Improvements for document library version history limits
CurrentVersion.description: We are introducing new version controls that help tenant and site admins or document library owners reduce the storage footprint driven by low value file versions. Today, document library owners can set count-based version limits at the individual document library level. With the upcoming changes, tenant and site admins or document library owners will have two version history settings: 1) Automatic mode that intelligently expires new and existing version based on their age and restore probability, and 2) Manual mode that will allow admins to set time-based version expiration and count limits on new and existing versions. These controls enable admins to set an appropriate level of recoverability and auditability for their organization balanced with storage usage considerations. Version history limits and management also apply to OneDrive for Business.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance: Enhanced Policy Conditions
CurrentVersion.description: Three updates are coming to enhance policy conditions. First, our updated policy conditions enable the detection of messages sent and received both to and from external email addresses, allowing you to identify specific instances of information being shared with external contacts. Secondly, with the new OR condition capability, you can combine multiple conditions within the same policy, creating custom logic to suit your unique compliance requirements. Lastly, to make policy creation and updates a seamless process, we've introduced the ability to test conditions before implementing them. By using sample messages, you can evaluate how your conditions will perform and fine-tune them to align with your compliance goals.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: Video trim feature
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Stream (on SharePoint) will soon introduce a video trimming feature which will allow users with edit permissions to trim the start, end and any parts in the middle of a video.  When you trim a video, Stream won’t change the original video file itself. Instead, it just hides the trimmed parts from your viewers.  When you're done trimming you can toggle to the preview mode to see the trimmed video just like your viewers will see. When a video is trimmed the transcript and chapters will be adjusted automatically to reflect only what is shown in the video. People with edit permission will be able to see full original content and edit or delete those trimmed parts. When available this feature can be accessed by opening a video in the Stream web app and taping the edit button.

When a video is trimmed the transcript and chapters will be adjusted automatically to reflect only what is shown in the video. People with edit permission will be able to see full original content and edit or delete those trimmed parts. When available this feature can be accessed by opening a video in the Stream web app and taping the edit button.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: Pay-as-you-go transcript translations
CurrentVersion.description:
Make your content more inclusive by creating videos that your coworkers can easily view and understand in their primary language. Transcript translations in Stream (on SharePoint) give you the option to translate the transcript and closed captions of your Stream videos into more than 100 supported languages. To enable translations Admins must first setup billing using an Azure subscription, then they must be enable the feature in the M365 Admin center. Once enabled translations are billed via pay-as-you-go meters.
More info: https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/office/microsoft-syntex-pay-as-you-go-transcript-translations-in-stream-for-sharepoint-2e34ad1b-e213-47ed-a806-5cc0d88751de

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: UX improvements for Multi-Tenant Organization (MTO) users
CurrentVersion.description: This release features user experience improvements when Microsoft Teams users interact with users in another tenant that belongs to their organization (e.g., for conglomerates, as a result of mergers and acquisitions). Key changes include removing the possibility of split 1:1 chat threads, richer profile information, removal of the "External" label, and introducing support for an optional admin configurable label.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Message/Attachment contains EXO predicates
CurrentVersion.description: Introducing two new DLP Exchange predicates: "Message contains" and "Attachment contains" with a focus on DLP evaluation on specific email components like email body or attachments only. Unlike the broader "Content contains" predicate that evaluated entire email envelope, these enable targeted DLP evaluation on specific email components only.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Adaptive Protection in Gov Cloud
CurrentVersion.description: Adaptive Protection will now be available in Government clouds. Adaptive Protection is a capability of Microsoft Purview that dynamically assigns appropriate Data Loss Prevention policies to users based on the risk levels analyzed by the machine learning models in Insider Risk Management. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: OneDrive: Change to shared folder experience in OneDrive
CurrentVersion.description: We're making a change to the shared folder experience in OneDrive. Currently, when a user opens a shared folder in OneDrive, they are taken to a view of that folder within the sharers OneDrive. In the new experience, opening a shared folder will take the user to the shared folder within the People view of their own OneDrive. This view, organized by people, shows and allows access to all the files and folders that have been shared with the user.

CurrentVersion.title: OneDrive: Find your files faster than ever with a new and improved search experience in OneDrive Web
CurrentVersion.description: OneDrive for web now lets you find your files faster than ever with a new and improved search functionality. Say goodbye to the days of endlessly scrolling through folders to find that one elusive document. With our latest update, locating your files is now faster and more intuitive than ever before. Whether it's in your personal OneDrive, shared folders, or document libraries, our improved search feature allows you to seamlessly sift through your digital workspace from one centralized location. We've added new filters for different file types, ensuring you can pinpoint exactly what you're looking for and with the date filter, you can narrow down your search results to find files created or modified within a specific timeframe. We understand that searching within a folder or document library is important to you, and for that, we have simplified scoping options that will enable precise searches within folders, sites, or document libraries. We've also visually updated the interface with more metadata, ensuring you effortlessly identify the right files every time.

OldVersion.description: Today, admins must manage retention and deletion for Copilot for Microsoft 365 interactions using a retention policy location that also includes Microsoft Teams chats. This feature will provide a new location option to manage only Copilot interactions, separate from Microsoft Teams chats.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance- Customize communication compliance policies with language-specific trainable classifier conditions
CurrentVersion.description: Tailor your policy conditions to run Trainable Classifiers for specific languages. By restricting the languages for classifiers, you can reduce false positives and bring precision to your policy conditions. Update your existing policies with ease for a more language-specific compliance approach.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance- Customize communication compliance policies with language-specific trainable classifier conditions
OldVersion.description: Tailor your policy conditions to run Trainable Classifiers for specific languages. By restricting the languages for classifiers, you can reduce false positives and bring precision to your policy conditions. Update your existing policies with ease for a more language-specific compliance approach.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Move menu improvements
CurrentVersion.description: Two improvements are coming to the move menu on Outlook for iOS and Android. Users will now be able to expand and collapse folders within the move menu and see folder hierarchy when searching in the move menu.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Move menu improvements
OldVersion.description: Two improvements are coming to the move menu on Outlook for iOS and Android. Users will now be able to expand and collapse folders within the move menu and see folder hierarchy when searching in the move menu.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Connections News Notifications in Gov Clouds
CurrentVersion.description:
With this release, existing news notifications in Viva Connections will now be available in GCC, GCCH and DoD. News notifications are delivered via Microsoft Teams in the desktop, mobile, and web environments in the following scenarios: News is published to a SharePoint team or communication site a user follows or by someone a user works closely with.
News is boosted. Someone comments on a new News post. Someone "Likes" a News post. Someone is @mentioned in a comment on a news post.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Connections News Notifications in Gov Clouds
OldVersion.description:
With this release, existing news notifications in Viva Connections will now be available in GCC, GCCH and DoD. News notifications are delivered via Microsoft Teams in the desktop, mobile, and web environments in the following scenarios: News is published to a SharePoint team or communication site a user follows or by someone a user works closely with.
News is boosted. Someone comments on a new News post. Someone "Likes" a News post. Someone is @mentioned in a comment on a news post.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Block a user for your organization
CurrentVersion.description: With the availability of the delete API (removeallaccessforuser API), it does not stop the malicious user from resending the message to the same victim. To help prevent that, a block user API will allow the admin to block the malicious user from reaching out again. To make this even more effective, we will utilize a similar feature as the allow/block list in federation to block the malicious user from the entire organization.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Block a user for your organization
OldVersion.description: With the availability of the delete API (removeallaccessforuser API), it does not stop the malicious user from resending the message to the same victim. To help prevent that, a block user API will allow the admin to block the malicious user from reaching out again. To make this even more effective, we will utilize a similar feature as the allow/block list in federation to block the malicious user from the entire organization.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage - Mute conversations
CurrentVersion.description: Corporate communicators, network admins, and Engage admins can remove chosen conversation threads from the Engage Home Feed, storylines feed, and email digests. Conversations continue to show in community feeds, user profiles, and search. Muting a conversation does not affect notifications.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage - Mute conversations
OldVersion.description: Corporate communicators, network admins, and Engage admins can remove chosen conversation threads from the Engage Home Feed, storylines feed, and email digests. Conversations continue to show in community feeds, user profiles, and search. Muting a conversation does not affect notifications.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Audio zones enable Mesh creators to craft custom audio experiences
CurrentVersion.description: We will not release Audio Zones for Mesh Toolkit at this time. We are sorry for any inconvenience and will continue to share updated roadmap entries as additional Mesh features and functionality become available in Teams. Spatial audio in Mesh provides a realistic recreation of how sound moves in the real world, with the volume of people speaking or media playing getting lower of as you move away from the source of the sound. The introduction of audio zones enables creators to craft custom audio experiences for the intended use of a space with features such as extended audio drop off distances for conversations that happen in a large area, or restricting what audio can enter a given area, to allow smaller groups to have lively conversations without disrupting their neighbors.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Audio zones enable Mesh creators to craft custom audio experiences
OldVersion.description: Spatial audio in Mesh provides a realistic recreation of how sound moves in the real world, with the volume of people speaking or media playing getting lower of as you move away from the source of the sound.  The introduction of audio zones enables creators to craft custom audio experiences for the intended use of a space with features such as extended audio drop off distances for conversations that happen in a large area, or restricting what audio can enter a given area, to allow smaller groups to have lively conversations without disrupting their neighbors.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: OneDrive in Outlook for Mac
CurrentVersion.description: Quickly access your OneDrive without having to leave Outlook! Users can find and use the OneDrive app in Outlook for Mac, for a consistent and fast experience.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: OneDrive in Outlook for Mac
OldVersion.description: Quickly access your OneDrive without having to leave Outlook! Users can find and use the OneDrive app in Outlook for Mac, for a consistent and fast experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - User exclusion
CurrentVersion.description: This introduces the ability to exclude users and groups from IRM policies. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Amplify - Design Ideas
CurrentVersion.description: Authors can now use Design Ideas in Microsoft Viva Amplify to rearrange and reformat their image section, text section, and banner webpart.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Amplify - Design Ideas
OldVersion.description: Authors can now use Design Ideas in Microsoft Viva Amplify to rearrange and reformat their image section, text section, and banner webpart.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Ground prompts using SharePoint and OneDrive Folders
CurrentVersion.description: Users will be able to select SharePoint and ODSP Folders from the new "Attach cloud files" experience in CIQ to scope their prompts to.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Offline app boot
CurrentVersion.description: This introduces the ability to open or restart the new Outlook for Windows when not connected to the internet. Previously, you needed a connection to the internet to open or restart the new Outlook. Offline access is only supported when the app is already running and then goes offline. Opening and restarting the app while offline will be introduced with this rollout. #newoutlookforwindows

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Offline app boot
OldVersion.description: This introduces the ability to open or restart the new Outlook for Windows when not connected to the internet. Previously, you needed a connection to the internet to open or restart the new Outlook. Offline access is only supported when the app is already running and then goes offline. Opening and restarting the app while offline will be introduced with this rollout. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Edge on MacOS now seamlessly opens links in Teams
CurrentVersion.description: When you set the default browser to Microsoft Edge on MacOS and enable the feature, web links from the Teams desktop app sent via chats, channels, calendar, and other entry points will seamlessly open automatically in the profile that is signed into Teams app and skips the need to reauthenticate in the browser making it faster and easier to access content.  Administrators can control the availability of this feature using the "Choose Which Browser Opens Web Links" Microsoft 365 policy.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Edge on MacOS now seamlessly opens links in Teams
OldVersion.description: When you set the default browser to Microsoft Edge on MacOS and enable the feature, web links from the Teams desktop app sent via chats, channels, calendar, and other entry points will seamlessly open automatically in the profile that is signed into Teams app and skips the need to reauthenticate in the browser making it faster and easier to access content.  Administrators can control the availability of this feature using the "Choose Which Browser Opens Web Links" Microsoft 365 policy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Meeting organizers can turn off copying or forwarding of live captions, transcript, and recap for meetings (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: We are expanding the existing ‘Turn off copying or forwarding of meeting chat’ control for meeting organizers to include live captions, transcription, and meeting recap. With this change, meeting organizers with eligible licenses will see a control called ‘Turn off copying and forwarding of meeting chat, live captions, and transcript’ in the meeting options. When this control is enabled, meeting participants won’t be able to copy the meeting chat, live captions, live transcript, or any insights generated from intelligent meeting recap.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Meeting organizers can turn off copying or forwarding of live captions, transcript, and recap for meetings (Premium)
OldVersion.description: We are expanding the existing ‘Turn off copying or forwarding of meeting chat’ control for meeting organizers to include live captions, transcription, and meeting recap. With this change, meeting organizers with eligible licenses will see a control called ‘Turn off copying and forwarding of meeting chat, live captions, and transcript’ in the meeting options. When this control is enabled, meeting participants won’t be able to copy the meeting chat, live captions, live transcript, or any insights generated from intelligent meeting recap.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Queues app on Teams phone devices
CurrentVersion.description: Queues app on Teams phone devices enhances call management capabilities by allowing agents to handle incoming calls, view call queues, and manage call history directly from their Teams phone devices, improving efficiency and ensuring effortless communication for agents.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Queues app on Teams phone devices
OldVersion.description: Queues app on Teams phone devices enhances call management capabilities by allowing agents to handle incoming calls, view call queues, and manage call history directly from their Teams phone devices, improving efficiency and ensuring effortless communication for agents.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Collaborative call delegation on Teams phone devices
CurrentVersion.description: Teams phone device users will be able to share access to their phone line with a specific group of users, without a structured delegation system. This enables group members to receive calls and initiate calls on behalf of others, enabling a simple and collaborative communication experience.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Collaborative call delegation on Teams phone devices
OldVersion.description: Teams phone device users will be able to share access to their phone line with a specific group of users, without a structured delegation system. This enables group members to receive calls and initiate calls on behalf of others, enabling a simple and collaborative communication experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Shared call history for call delegation on Teams phone devices
CurrentVersion.description: Call delegators and their delegates can now view shared call history records for the shared line directly on their Teams phone devices. This enhancement promotes greater transparency and collaboration. All delegates associated with a user will be able to monitor incoming and outgoing calls for the shared line, irrespective of their participation in the call.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Shared call history for call delegation on Teams phone devices
OldVersion.description: Call delegators and their delegates can now view shared call history records for the shared line directly on their Teams phone devices. This enhancement promotes greater transparency and collaboration. All delegates associated with a user will be able to monitor incoming and outgoing calls for the shared line, irrespective of their participation in the call.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Quick rewrite, summarize, and to do actions with Copilot on OneNote canvas
CurrentVersion.description: Use Copilot in your workflow on the canvas by invoking Copilot to generate a summary, a to-do list, or to help you rewrite the content on the page or based on your selection.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot on OneNote canvas
CurrentVersion.description: Use Copilot right in your workflow by invoking Copilot to generate a summary, a to-do list, or help you rewrite the content on the page or based on your selection.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Event Chat for town halls
CurrentVersion.description: Previously in a town hall, only presenters and organizers could chat with each other. With this new update, attendees, presenters and organizers can now chat together during a town hall using the new Event Chat feature. Presenters and organizers can still chat privately during the town hall as well.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Event Chat for town halls
OldVersion.description: Previously in a town hall, only presenters and organizers could chat with each other. With this new update, attendees, presenters and organizers can now chat together during a town hall using the new Event Chat feature. Presenters and organizers can still chat privately during the town hall as well.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Email verification for external attendees to join Teams meetings
CurrentVersion.description: Meeting organizers can have greater confidence about external attendees joining Teams meetings, this capability enables sending a one-time passcode to the external attendee’s email address for that individual to use during a verification step when joining a Teams meeting.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Decorate your background for GCC environment (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: Decorate your background is now available to customers in the GCC environment. Decorate your background is a generative background effect in Teams that makes meetings more fun and personal by using AI to spruce up your meeting background. Blend your physical and digital spaces, enabling you to revamp what’s seen of your physical meeting space for each call. This technology allows for effortless room clean-ups, adding virtual plants, or festive decorations for special events. Decorate your background requires a Teams Premium license.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Improved Microsoft Lists links in Teams messages
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Lists links in Teams including list item links and form links will now unfurl when shared in Teams messages making them easier to find and access within Teams messages and inside shared tab in chats.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Improved Microsoft Lists links in Teams messages
OldVersion.description: Microsoft Lists links in Teams including list item links and form links will now unfurl when shared in Teams messages making them easier to find and access within Teams messages and inside shared tab in chats.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Bulk operations summary in the Teams admin center
CurrentVersion.description: IT admins can monitor and track the status of all bulk operations on Teams Devices through the Teams admin center, enabling large-scale management.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Ability to give and take control during screensharing on Web
CurrentVersion.description: The new update will allow the users to be able to use the give and take control function during screenshare on web similarly to how the users are used to do on the desktop version of the application.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Name pronunciation
CurrentVersion.description: You can now record and share the correct pronunciation of your name, promoting inclusivity and helping colleagues avoid mispronunciations. With a click, you can play and listen to your colleagues' name pronunciations.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Web grounding for Microsoft 365 Copilot Business Chat in Teams and Outlook
CurrentVersion.description: Ground conversations in the latest information from the web in Business Chat web mode.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Choose between Copilot Business Chat with web or work grounding
CurrentVersion.description: In Outlook for iOS and Android, you will soon be able to choose whether Microsoft 365 Copilot Business Chat uses Microsoft 365 Graph (work) or Web grounding via a Work/Web toggle within the chat interface, just like you can at microsoft365.com/chat. Web grounding will be available for all commercial Microsoft 365 customers, while Graph grounding will require a Copilot for Microsoft 365 license.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage - Recommended comments
CurrentVersion.description: Viva Engage will offer a new way to see contributions from close contacts and leaders within conversation threads. In the home feed and More for You feed, users see two comments that are meaningful to them and the overall conversation. Users can see the rest of the conversation with one click. There are no changes to the comment, reply, or reaction experiences with this new feature.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Charts, Graphs and Data Analysis in Copilot for Microsoft 365
CurrentVersion.description: Use prompts to create charts, graphs, and data analysis in Business Chat.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Updates for font management capabilities
CurrentVersion.description: We are introducing updates that provide capabilities for managing custom fonts for SharePoint and Viva Connections. This includes the ability to hide the From Microsoft font packages from Change the look, apply a font package in your site templates, and updated availability for the From Microsoft font packages.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Entra compromised user signals in IRM
CurrentVersion.description:
With this feature, IRM analysts can identify if the user being investigated has any compromise user alerts in Microsoft Entra. This will help them formulate the right response action, like escalating the Incident to SOC teams for quick remediation, etc. Microsoft Entra offers two types of compromised user detections: 1. Sign in risk detections - Compromise risk associated with a specific sign-in. 2. User risk detections - Compromise risk associated with a specific user. - Insider risk management admins can opt into each of the above risk detections from Insider risk management global settings. - Risk detections will be available in the indicator timeline within the alert investigation experience. - Risk detections will not impact the risk score or severity of Insider risk management alerts. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/entra/id-protection/concept-identity-protection-risks

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Ability to increase configuration of CPU and GPU device resource utilization limits in Forensic Evidence
CurrentVersion.description:
Insider Risk Management Administrators will now be able to increase the CPU and GPU device resource utilization limit for all devices uploading Forensic Evidence clips in their organization. Forensic Evidence will now allow up to 31% CPU and GPU device resource utilization, up from the prior maximum limit of 5%. This enhancement reduces interruptions in the recording and uploading of clips.

Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Updated Hyperlink Insertion
CurrentVersion.description: You can now insert a hyperlink to your chat message text in fewer clicks. Select the text you want to display and paste the URL, without needing to use the traditional hyperlink dialogue box.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: Playback support for video encoded in Apple ProRes video codec
CurrentVersion.description: Users will be able to play back video hosted on OneDrive and SharePoint that is encoded in the Apple ProRes video codec.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage - Leaders updated via group sync
CurrentVersion.description: Currently, leaders are managed in Viva Engage manually. If you wish to add or remove leaders, you need to go to Engage to do so. This feature will allow you to define a group that includes users who should be designated as leaders. As you add or remove people from that group, they will gain or lose privileges accordingly. The manual method will continue to be available.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Best practice configuration monitoring dashboard in Teams admin center
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft recommends best practices to ensure a smooth collaborative experience on Teams. Best Practices dashboard in Teams admin center allows administrators to monitor and promptly address any non-conformance across their organization.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Improved People Search
CurrentVersion.description: You can now search for content related to specific people.  Start by typing the name of the relevant person in the search bar and select the filter to narrow down the search results and get relevant content suggestions.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Brand Impersonation Protection for Teams Messaging
CurrentVersion.description: Identify if an external user is impersonating a brand commonly targeted by phishing attacks, during their initial contact with an enterprise user via Teams messages.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Org Explorer available for all M365 commercial users
CurrentVersion.description: Org Explorer for Outlook helps you to visualize and explore your company’s internal structure, work teams, and individual roles. This feature will be available in Outlook for all M365 enterprise users, including Microsoft Viva users.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Enable admins to inherit document library label from container label of a group/site/team
CurrentVersion.description: This enables admins to inherit document library label from the container label of a group/site/team. New and edited documents within the default document library will be labeled automatically. If the SharePoint admin had already configured a default document library labeling, this setting will not override it.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: eSignature integration with Adobe and Docusign rolling out globally
CurrentVersion.description:
Previously, the use third-party providers as part of SharePoint eSignature platform were limited to regions supported by Microsoft's native SharePoint eSignature. 
With this release, customers can now enjoy the flexibility of using these third-party providers globally, wherever they are supported.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: AI administrator role
CurrentVersion.description: We are introducing a new admin role for AI and Microsoft Copilot administration. Admin users assigned with the AI Administrator role can efficiently manage Microsoft Copilot without the vast privileges of Global admin permissions.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Delivery and read receipts in Outlook mobile
CurrentVersion.description: Now you will be able to request both delivery and read receipts while composing an email in Outlook for iOS and Android. You will also easily be able to respond to requests for read receipts on emails you receive and set preferences for future read receipts.

CurrentVersion.title: Excel: Refresh queries from Authenticated Data Sources in Excel for the Web
CurrentVersion.description: You can now refresh Power Query data from data sources that require authentication in Excel for the Web.

OldVersion.title: Excel: Refresh queries from Authenticated Data Sources in Excel for the Web
OldVersion.description: You can now refresh Power Query data from data sources that require authentication in Excel for the Web.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Contact sync to Android-based Teams devices from Teams admin center
CurrentVersion.description: IT admins can push a set of contacts from the Teams admin center (TAC) to Teams devices as speed dial contacts.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Contact sync to Android-based Teams devices from Teams admin center
OldVersion.description: IT admins can push a set of contacts from the Teams admin center (TAC) to Teams devices as speed dial contacts.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Reset People Suggestions in Search
CurrentVersion.description: This feature will allow users to reset, export, and/or opt out of people suggestions in search through Outlook on the web and the new Outlook for Windows settings. If a reset is done, all versions of Outlook will reflect the change. Note: The release month and status have been updated to show current state. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Reset People Suggestions in Search
OldVersion.description: This feature will allow users to reset, export, and/or opt out of people suggestions in search through Outlook on the web and the new Outlook for Windows settings. If a reset is done, all versions of Outlook will reflect the change. Note: The release month and status have been updated to show current state. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Actionable card based Loop components
CurrentVersion.description: Add a Microsoft 365 app that supports link unfurling with an actionable card-based Loop component, and Outlook will show the component when inserting supported links in your email messages. You will be able to choose between the new embedded card or a link when sending email.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Content Pane for SharePoint Pages and News.
CurrentVersion.description: The content pane is a new place for relevant panes that help authors create their publications. With the introduction of this centralized location, a new toolbox will help authors quickly browse and add content to create rich and engaging pages. The content pane will include additional panes such as configuration tools, design ideas, etc. Within Viva Amplify, the content pane is also used to host the distribution channel selection, writing guidance, and audience selection.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Improvements for document library version history limits
CurrentVersion.description: We are introducing new version controls that help tenant and site admins or document library owners reduce the storage footprint driven by low value file versions. Today, document library owners can set count-based version limits at the individual document library level. With the upcoming changes, tenant and site admins or document library owners will have two version history settings: 1) Automatic mode that intelligently expires new and existing version based on their age and restore probability, and 2) Manual mode that will allow admins to set time-based version expiration and count limits on new and existing versions. These controls enable admins to set an appropriate level of recoverability and auditability for their organization balanced with storage usage considerations. Version history limits and management also apply to OneDrive for Business.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Folder/Subfolder Recursive Search
CurrentVersion.description: Search now returns content stored in the main folder and content stored within all its sub-folders. Note: We have updated the release phase to show the current state.  We apologize for any inconveniences this may cause.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance: Enhanced Policy Conditions
CurrentVersion.description: Three updates are coming to enhance policy conditions. First, our updated policy conditions enable the detection of messages sent and received both to and from external email addresses, allowing you to identify specific instances of information being shared with external contacts. Secondly, with the new OR condition capability, you can combine multiple conditions within the same policy, creating custom logic to suit your unique compliance requirements. Lastly, to make policy creation and updates a seamless process, we've introduced the ability to test conditions before implementing them. By using sample messages, you can evaluate how your conditions will perform and fine-tune them to align with your compliance goals.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention for endpoints-Support for Two New Predicates on Endpoint DLP
CurrentVersion.description:
With this capability, admins can extend the two below mentioned predicates to Microsoft Purview DLP for Endpoint 
- Document Property is
- Document name contains words or phrases

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: Video trim feature
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Stream (on SharePoint) will soon introduce a video trimming feature which will allow users with edit permissions to trim the start, end and any parts in the middle of a video.  When you trim a video, Stream won’t change the original video file itself. Instead, it just hides the trimmed parts from your viewers.  When you're done trimming you can toggle to the preview mode to see the trimmed video just like your viewers will see. When a video is trimmed the transcript and chapters will be adjusted automatically to reflect only what is shown in the video. People with edit permission will be able to see full original content and edit or delete those trimmed parts. When available this feature can be accessed by opening a video in the Stream web app and taping the edit button.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Bing search integration brings the power of the web to your chats in Word
CurrentVersion.description: Ask Copilot a question in Word chat, and Copilot generates an answer using the power of integrated Bing search. And you never have to leave the app.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: Pay-as-you-go transcript translations
CurrentVersion.description:
Make your content more inclusive by creating videos that your coworkers can easily view and understand in their primary language. Transcript translations in Stream (on SharePoint) give you the option to translate the transcript and closed captions of your Stream videos into more than 100 supported languages. To enable translations Admins must first setup billing using an Azure subscription, then they must be enable the feature in the M365 Admin center. Once enabled translations are billed via pay-as-you-go meters.
More info: https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/office/microsoft-syntex-pay-as-you-go-transcript-translations-in-stream-for-sharepoint-2e34ad1b-e213-47ed-a806-5cc0d88751de

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot in Excel - Graph Grounded Chat
CurrentVersion.description: Ask Copilot for answers grounded in your work content from the Microsoft Graph—your chats, documents, meetings, and emails—beyond your active Excel workbook. If you’re analyzing a workbook and want to enhance your understanding using information from another source in your tenant, just ask Copilot in Excel.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: UX improvements for Multi-Tenant Organization (MTO) users
CurrentVersion.description: This release features user experience improvements when Microsoft Teams users interact with users in another tenant that belongs to their organization (e.g., for conglomerates, as a result of mergers and acquisitions). Key changes include removing the possibility of split 1:1 chat threads, richer profile information, removal of the "External" label, and introducing support for an optional admin configurable label.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: Stream Web App Recap Button
CurrentVersion.description: This feature allows a user to move from the Stream Web App to the equivalent meeting recording on Microsoft Teams (in the Recap tab). Watching the meeting in Microsoft Teams provides additional meeting information such as Speakers and Topics.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Message/Attachment contains EXO predicates
CurrentVersion.description: Introducing two new DLP Exchange predicates: "Message contains" and "Attachment contains" with a focus on DLP evaluation on specific email components like email body or attachments only. Unlike the broader "Content contains" predicate that evaluated entire email envelope, these enable targeted DLP evaluation on specific email components only.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Adaptive Protection in Gov Cloud
CurrentVersion.description: Adaptive Protection will now be available in Government clouds. Adaptive Protection is a capability of Microsoft Purview that dynamically assigns appropriate Data Loss Prevention policies to users based on the risk levels analyzed by the machine learning models in Insider Risk Management. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery - Enhancements for eDiscovery support of Loop content
CurrentVersion.description: Now eDiscovery admins can review Loop components created in Outlook or Teams within eDiscovery (Premium) as rendered HTML files to help understand the content that has been created within the Loop component. Once the component has been reviewed, it can then be exported as an HTML file to meet the requirements of the case.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Pulse - Integration into Microsoft Copilot Dashboard from Viva Insights
CurrentVersion.description: Initiate a Copilot impact survey that helps leaders and IT admins understand the return on investment of rolling out Copilot and AI tools across their organizations. Viva Pulse provides a way for organizations to capture sentiment data that maps to work patterns data from Viva Insights to measure AI adoption.

CurrentVersion.title: Exchange: High Volume Email for Microsoft 365
CurrentVersion.description: High Volume Email is a new service for line of business applications and other high-volume SMTP scenarios that enables you to send internal messages beyond the current limits of Exchange Online.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage – pin post to leadership corner
CurrentVersion.description: Admins and corporate communicators will be able to pin one post that will show at the top of everyone's leadership corner

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: Delete option in Stream Web App
CurrentVersion.description: Stream is adding a delete option to the Stream Web App. If a user has editing permissions to a video in Stream, they will be able to delete a video directly from the Stream Web App by clicking the delete button on the command bar and confirming the action. The video file will be sent to the Recycle Bin of the OneDrive or SharePoint page the video was hosted on and any access to the video will lead to a page informing the user that the video has been removed.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview: Insider Risk Management - Microsoft Fabric risk indicators in Insider Risk Management
CurrentVersion.description: With this update, Insider Risk Management extends its risk-detection capabilities to Microsoft Fabric products by offering ready-to-use risk indicators based on user activities in Power BI. Organizations can use these new indicators in data theft and data leaks policies. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Summary in Chat support for document text selection
CurrentVersion.description: Summary requests in chat can be limited to operate only on the user-selected text in the document, rather than operating in large part against the entire document.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Engage content in Workplace Search
CurrentVersion.description: As users search in office.com, sharepoint.com, bing at work they will find content from Viva Engage in the search results. We will first start with question posts and then roll out discussion posts from Engage.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Apply coaching suggestions for Coaching by Copilot
CurrentVersion.description: Apply coaching suggestions will allow users to request a complete rewrite of their email based on feedback from Coaching by Copilot and in one click, accept and rewrite their email with those suggestions.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Select specific pieces of text in an email and use Copilot to rewrite them
CurrentVersion.description: When composing an email, customers can select portions of text in an email and use Copilot to rewrite it. Users can give detailed instructions on how to rewrite and also able to modify tone and length. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Lifecycle Management - Bulk replacement or removal of a retention label
CurrentVersion.description: Admins can perform a bulk replacement or removal of a retention label using the Purview compliance portal. They can perform the action across the entire tenant or targeted to specific content using KQL and static or adaptive scopes.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Ability to block Attendee Emails from Teams Webinars
CurrentVersion.description: This feature allows the organizers of webinars to block the sending of attendee emails from Microsoft Teams.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Audit - New logs for Audit activities
CurrentVersion.description: Activities performed by users within the Purview Audit feature, like submitting an Audit search query, viewing and exporting Audit logs, and deleting search history, will now begin to generate Audit logs.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Ability to block Attendee Emails from Teams Town Halls
CurrentVersion.description: This feature allows the organizers of town halls to block the sending of attendee emails from Microsoft Teams.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Enhancements to the device onboarding page
CurrentVersion.description: This adds new enhancements to the device onboarding page, including these: search by IP address to look up devices, filter using the new "Valid user" filter, use a refined device list to only include devices that can be DLP supported (exclude Android devices from showing in the device onboarding list), and use new properties in the export report (valid user, first onboarded date, MDATP device ID, Defender engine version, Defender Mocamp version, Endpoint DLP status, last policy sync time, and Advanced Classification bandwidth usage exceeded).

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Audit - Blanket custom retention policies which apply to all Audit recordTypes
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Purview is enhancing the Audit custom retention policy experience. With this change, customers can now create blanket custom retention policies which will apply to all Audit recordTypes. This capability will become available in addition to the existing support of manually selecting specific recordTypes in the custom policy.

CurrentVersion.title: OneDrive: Change to shared folder experience in OneDrive
CurrentVersion.description: We're making a change to the shared folder experience in OneDrive. Currently, when a user opens a shared folder in OneDrive, they are taken to a view of that folder within the sharers OneDrive. In the new experience, opening a shared folder will take the user to the shared folder within the People view of their own OneDrive. This view, organized by people, shows and allows access to all the files and folders that have been shared with the user.

CurrentVersion.title: OneDrive: Find your files faster than ever with a new and improved search experience in OneDrive Web
CurrentVersion.description: OneDrive for web now lets you find your files faster than ever with a new and improved search functionality. Say goodbye to the days of endlessly scrolling through folders to find that one elusive document. With our latest update, locating your files is now faster and more intuitive than ever before. Whether it's in your personal OneDrive, shared folders, or document libraries, our improved search feature allows you to seamlessly sift through your digital workspace from one centralized location. We've added new filters for different file types, ensuring you can pinpoint exactly what you're looking for and with the date filter, you can narrow down your search results to find files created or modified within a specific timeframe. We understand that searching within a folder or document library is important to you, and for that, we have simplified scoping options that will enable precise searches within folders, sites, or document libraries. We've also visually updated the interface with more metadata, ensuring you effortlessly identify the right files every time.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Rename general channel
CurrentVersion.description: In our efforts to bridge the gaps between general and other channels, introducing the ability to rename the general channel in your team. General channel in a team can be renamed by the team owner, or member (if they have permissions), to show up in the teams and channels list in alphabetical order.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning – Edit Learning Paths in Viva Learning
CurrentVersion.description: Admin will be able to edit learning paths metadata and content. Latest updates will be shown to learner after the LP is edited.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: New Copilot Compose experience
CurrentVersion.description: Major improvements to our Copilot Compose experience include a polished, lightweight UI.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Retention Labels are available for Loop pages and components
CurrentVersion.description: Organizations that rely on Microsoft's records management capabilities in Purview can now include Loop content in their workflows with Retention Labels on Loop pages and components. There's an in-app experience when a label is applied or a record is locked.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Voting, Filtering, Sorting, and Archiving Questions now available in the Q&A App on Teams
CurrentVersion.description: Take your Q&A to the next level with this new update that lets attendees vote on the questions they want presenters to answer. Organizers can sort questions by most voted, filter, and archive questions to keep the discussion focused in meetings and events.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Default sensitivity labels and policies enhancements
CurrentVersion.description: Eligible customers can activate default labels and policies for Microsoft Purview Information Protection that now extend to meetings.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Use the Alt key to bring up key tips in new Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: Users in new Outlook will now be able to use the Alt key to bring up key tips when using keyboard navigation. This behavior was previously Win+Alt. Other Outlook apps will not be impacted by these changes. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Use Copilot to search for answers from the web
CurrentVersion.description: Use Copilot in Excel to search for answers from the web and add it to your Excel workbook.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Chat with Copilot in Outlook mobile
CurrentVersion.description: The same Microsoft Copilot experience available in new Outlook for Windows, web, and classic Outlook soon will be available in Microsoft Outlook for iOS and Android through the module switcher.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Lifecycle Management - Separation of the Copilot for Microsoft 365 retention policy location from Microsoft Teams chats
CurrentVersion.description: Today, admins must manage retention and deletion for Copilot for Microsoft 365 interactions using a retention policy location that also includes Microsoft Teams chats. This feature will provide a new location option to manage only Copilot interactions, separate from Microsoft Teams chats.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance- Customize communication compliance policies with language-specific trainable classifier conditions
CurrentVersion.description: Tailor your policy conditions to run Trainable Classifiers for specific languages. By restricting the languages for classifiers, you can reduce false positives and bring precision to your policy conditions. Update your existing policies with ease for a more language-specific compliance approach.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Move menu improvements
CurrentVersion.description: Two improvements are coming to the move menu on Outlook for iOS and Android. Users will now be able to expand and collapse folders within the move menu and see folder hierarchy when searching in the move menu.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Connections News Notifications in Gov Clouds
CurrentVersion.description:
With this release, existing news notifications in Viva Connections will now be available in GCC, GCCH and DoD. News notifications are delivered via Microsoft Teams in the desktop, mobile, and web environments in the following scenarios: News is published to a SharePoint team or communication site a user follows or by someone a user works closely with.
News is boosted. Someone comments on a new News post. Someone "Likes" a News post. Someone is @mentioned in a comment on a news post.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Block a user for your organization
CurrentVersion.description: With the availability of the delete API (removeallaccessforuser API), it does not stop the malicious user from resending the message to the same victim. To help prevent that, a block user API will allow the admin to block the malicious user from reaching out again. To make this even more effective, we will utilize a similar feature as the allow/block list in federation to block the malicious user from the entire organization.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage - Mute conversations
CurrentVersion.description: Corporate communicators, network admins, and Engage admins can remove chosen conversation threads from the Engage Home Feed, storylines feed, and email digests. Conversations continue to show in community feeds, user profiles, and search. Muting a conversation does not affect notifications.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Audio zones enable Mesh creators to craft custom audio experiences
CurrentVersion.description: We will not release Audio Zones for Mesh Toolkit at this time. We are sorry for any inconvenience and will continue to share updated roadmap entries as additional Mesh features and functionality become available in Teams. Spatial audio in Mesh provides a realistic recreation of how sound moves in the real world, with the volume of people speaking or media playing getting lower of as you move away from the source of the sound. The introduction of audio zones enables creators to craft custom audio experiences for the intended use of a space with features such as extended audio drop off distances for conversations that happen in a large area, or restricting what audio can enter a given area, to allow smaller groups to have lively conversations without disrupting their neighbors.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: OneDrive in Outlook for Mac
CurrentVersion.description: Quickly access your OneDrive without having to leave Outlook! Users can find and use the OneDrive app in Outlook for Mac, for a consistent and fast experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - User exclusion
CurrentVersion.description: This introduces the ability to exclude users and groups from IRM policies. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Amplify - Design Ideas
CurrentVersion.description: Authors can now use Design Ideas in Microsoft Viva Amplify to rearrange and reformat their image section, text section, and banner webpart.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Ground prompts using SharePoint and OneDrive Folders
CurrentVersion.description: Users will be able to select SharePoint and ODSP Folders from the new "Attach cloud files" experience in CIQ to scope their prompts to.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Offline app boot
CurrentVersion.description: This introduces the ability to open or restart the new Outlook for Windows when not connected to the internet. Previously, you needed a connection to the internet to open or restart the new Outlook. Offline access is only supported when the app is already running and then goes offline. Opening and restarting the app while offline will be introduced with this rollout. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Edge on MacOS now seamlessly opens links in Teams
CurrentVersion.description: When you set the default browser to Microsoft Edge on MacOS and enable the feature, web links from the Teams desktop app sent via chats, channels, calendar, and other entry points will seamlessly open automatically in the profile that is signed into Teams app and skips the need to reauthenticate in the browser making it faster and easier to access content.  Administrators can control the availability of this feature using the "Choose Which Browser Opens Web Links" Microsoft 365 policy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Meeting organizers can turn off copying or forwarding of live captions, transcript, and recap for meetings (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: We are expanding the existing ‘Turn off copying or forwarding of meeting chat’ control for meeting organizers to include live captions, transcription, and meeting recap. With this change, meeting organizers with eligible licenses will see a control called ‘Turn off copying and forwarding of meeting chat, live captions, and transcript’ in the meeting options. When this control is enabled, meeting participants won’t be able to copy the meeting chat, live captions, live transcript, or any insights generated from intelligent meeting recap.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Queues app on Teams phone devices
CurrentVersion.description: Queues app on Teams phone devices enhances call management capabilities by allowing agents to handle incoming calls, view call queues, and manage call history directly from their Teams phone devices, improving efficiency and ensuring effortless communication for agents.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Collaborative call delegation on Teams phone devices
CurrentVersion.description: Teams phone device users will be able to share access to their phone line with a specific group of users, without a structured delegation system. This enables group members to receive calls and initiate calls on behalf of others, enabling a simple and collaborative communication experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Shared call history for call delegation on Teams phone devices
CurrentVersion.description: Call delegators and their delegates can now view shared call history records for the shared line directly on their Teams phone devices. This enhancement promotes greater transparency and collaboration. All delegates associated with a user will be able to monitor incoming and outgoing calls for the shared line, irrespective of their participation in the call.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Quick rewrite, summarize, and to do actions with Copilot on OneNote canvas
CurrentVersion.description: Use Copilot in your workflow on the canvas by invoking Copilot to generate a summary, a to-do list, or to help you rewrite the content on the page or based on your selection.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot on OneNote canvas
CurrentVersion.description: Use Copilot right in your workflow by invoking Copilot to generate a summary, a to-do list, or help you rewrite the content on the page or based on your selection.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Event Chat for town halls
CurrentVersion.description: Previously in a town hall, only presenters and organizers could chat with each other. With this new update, attendees, presenters and organizers can now chat together during a town hall using the new Event Chat feature. Presenters and organizers can still chat privately during the town hall as well.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Email verification for external attendees to join Teams meetings
CurrentVersion.description: Meeting organizers can have greater confidence about external attendees joining Teams meetings, this capability enables sending a one-time passcode to the external attendee’s email address for that individual to use during a verification step when joining a Teams meeting.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Email verification for external attendees to join Teams meetings
CurrentVersion.description: Meeting organizers can have greater confidence about external attendees joining Teams meetings, this capability enables sending a one-time passcode to the external attendee’s email address for that individual to use during a verification step when joining a Teams meeting.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Decorate your background for GCC environment (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: Decorate your background is now available to customers in the GCC environment. Decorate your background is a generative background effect in Teams that makes meetings more fun and personal by using AI to spruce up your meeting background. Blend your physical and digital spaces, enabling you to revamp what’s seen of your physical meeting space for each call. This technology allows for effortless room clean-ups, adding virtual plants, or festive decorations for special events. Decorate your background requires a Teams Premium license.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Improved Microsoft Lists links in Teams messages
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Lists links in Teams including list item links and form links will now unfurl when shared in Teams messages making them easier to find and access within Teams messages and inside shared tab in chats.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Bulk operations summary in the Teams admin center
CurrentVersion.description: IT admins can monitor and track the status of all bulk operations on Teams Devices through the Teams admin center, enabling large-scale management.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Ability to give and take control during screensharing on Web
CurrentVersion.description: The new update will allow the users to be able to use the give and take control function during screenshare on web similarly to how the users are used to do on the desktop version of the application.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Ability to give and take control during screensharing on Web
CurrentVersion.description: The new update will allow the users to be able to use the give and take control function during screenshare on web similarly to how the users are used to do on the desktop version of the application.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Name pronunciation
CurrentVersion.description: You can now record and share the correct pronunciation of your name, promoting inclusivity and helping colleagues avoid mispronunciations. With a click, you can play and listen to your colleagues' name pronunciations.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Name pronunciation
CurrentVersion.description: You can now record and share the correct pronunciation of your name, promoting inclusivity and helping colleagues avoid mispronunciations. With a click, you can play and listen to your colleagues' name pronunciations.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Name pronunciation
CurrentVersion.description: You can now record and share the correct pronunciation of your name, promoting inclusivity and helping colleagues avoid mispronunciations. With a click, you can play and listen to your colleagues' name pronunciations.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Web grounding for Microsoft 365 Copilot Business Chat in Teams and Outlook
CurrentVersion.description: Ground conversations in the latest information from the web in Business Chat web mode.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Choose between Copilot Business Chat with web or work grounding
CurrentVersion.description: In Outlook for iOS and Android, you will soon be able to choose whether Microsoft 365 Copilot Business Chat uses Microsoft 365 Graph (work) or Web grounding via a Work/Web toggle within the chat interface, just like you can at microsoft365.com/chat. Web grounding will be available for all commercial Microsoft 365 customers, while Graph grounding will require a Copilot for Microsoft 365 license.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage - Recommended comments
CurrentVersion.description: Viva Engage will offer a new way to see contributions from close contacts and leaders within conversation threads. In the home feed and More for You feed, users see two comments that are meaningful to them and the overall conversation. Users can see the rest of the conversation with one click. There are no changes to the comment, reply, or reaction experiences with this new feature.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Charts, Graphs and Data Analysis in Copilot for Microsoft 365
CurrentVersion.description: Use prompts to create charts, graphs, and data analysis in Business Chat.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Updates for font management capabilities
CurrentVersion.description: We are introducing updates that provide capabilities for managing custom fonts for SharePoint and Viva Connections. This includes the ability to hide the From Microsoft font packages from Change the look, apply a font package in your site templates, and updated availability for the From Microsoft font packages.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Entra compromised user signals in IRM
CurrentVersion.description:
With this feature, IRM analysts can identify if the user being investigated has any compromise user alerts in Microsoft Entra. This will help them formulate the right response action, like escalating the Incident to SOC teams for quick remediation, etc. Microsoft Entra offers two types of compromised user detections: 1. Sign in risk detections - Compromise risk associated with a specific sign-in. 2. User risk detections - Compromise risk associated with a specific user. - Insider risk management admins can opt into each of the above risk detections from Insider risk management global settings. - Risk detections will be available in the indicator timeline within the alert investigation experience. - Risk detections will not impact the risk score or severity of Insider risk management alerts. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/entra/id-protection/concept-identity-protection-risks

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Ability to increase configuration of CPU and GPU device resource utilization limits in Forensic Evidence
CurrentVersion.description:
Insider Risk Management Administrators will now be able to increase the CPU and GPU device resource utilization limit for all devices uploading Forensic Evidence clips in their organization. Forensic Evidence will now allow up to 31% CPU and GPU device resource utilization, up from the prior maximum limit of 5%. This enhancement reduces interruptions in the recording and uploading of clips.

Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Updated Hyperlink Insertion
CurrentVersion.description: You can now insert a hyperlink to your chat message text in fewer clicks. Select the text you want to display and paste the URL, without needing to use the traditional hyperlink dialogue box.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: Playback support for video encoded in Apple ProRes video codec
CurrentVersion.description: Users will be able to play back video hosted on OneDrive and SharePoint that is encoded in the Apple ProRes video codec.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage - Leaders updated via group sync
CurrentVersion.description: Currently, leaders are managed in Viva Engage manually. If you wish to add or remove leaders, you need to go to Engage to do so. This feature will allow you to define a group that includes users who should be designated as leaders. As you add or remove people from that group, they will gain or lose privileges accordingly. The manual method will continue to be available.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Best practice configuration monitoring dashboard in Teams admin center
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft recommends best practices to ensure a smooth collaborative experience on Teams. Best Practices dashboard in Teams admin center allows administrators to monitor and promptly address any non-conformance across their organization.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Improved People Search
CurrentVersion.description: You can now search for content related to specific people.  Start by typing the name of the relevant person in the search bar and select the filter to narrow down the search results and get relevant content suggestions.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Brand Impersonation Protection for Teams Messaging
CurrentVersion.description: Identify if an external user is impersonating a brand commonly targeted by phishing attacks, during their initial contact with an enterprise user via Teams messages.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Org Explorer available for all M365 commercial users
CurrentVersion.description: Org Explorer for Outlook helps you to visualize and explore your company’s internal structure, work teams, and individual roles. This feature will be available in Outlook for all M365 enterprise users, including Microsoft Viva users.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Enable admins to inherit document library label from container label of a group/site/team
CurrentVersion.description: This enables admins to inherit document library label from the container label of a group/site/team. New and edited documents within the default document library will be labeled automatically. If the SharePoint admin had already configured a default document library labeling, this setting will not override it.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: eSignature integration with Adobe and Docusign rolling out globally
CurrentVersion.description:
Previously, the use third-party providers as part of SharePoint eSignature platform were limited to regions supported by Microsoft's native SharePoint eSignature. 
With this release, customers can now enjoy the flexibility of using these third-party providers globally, wherever they are supported.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: AI administrator role
CurrentVersion.description: We are introducing a new admin role for AI and Microsoft Copilot administration. Admin users assigned with the AI Administrator role can efficiently manage Microsoft Copilot without the vast privileges of Global admin permissions.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Delivery and read receipts in Outlook mobile
CurrentVersion.description: Now you will be able to request both delivery and read receipts while composing an email in Outlook for iOS and Android. You will also easily be able to respond to requests for read receipts on emails you receive and set preferences for future read receipts.

CurrentVersion.title: Excel: Refresh queries from Authenticated Data Sources in Excel for the Web
CurrentVersion.description: You can now refresh Power Query data from data sources that require authentication in Excel for the Web.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Contact sync to Android-based Teams devices from Teams admin center
CurrentVersion.description: IT admins can push a set of contacts from the Teams admin center (TAC) to Teams devices as speed dial contacts.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Reset People Suggestions in Search
CurrentVersion.description: This feature will allow users to reset, export, and/or opt out of people suggestions in search through Outlook on the web and the new Outlook for Windows settings. If a reset is done, all versions of Outlook will reflect the change. Note: The release month and status have been updated to show current state. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
